Please ensure you:

attach any relevant labels,  

add this issue to the "Tasks" project,

use checkboxes for sub-tasks in your issue, like this:  
- [ ] task 1  
- [ ] task 2  
- [ ] task 3  

and assign someone to this issue if relevant.
